statements: SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT customer_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE consultation_type = 'Virtual';
SELECT appointment_id, customer_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT appointment_id, customer_name AS client_name, project_details FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, consultation_type FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_time, project_details FROM Appointments WHERE consultation_type = 'Virtual' ORDER BY appointment_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-02-15' AND project_details LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND project_details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY appointment_date, appointment_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_id, customer_id, consultation_type FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM projects WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-02-15' AND project_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC
SELECT appointment_id, customer_id, appointment_date, consultation_type FROM appointments WHERE consultation_type = 'In-person'
SELECT appointment_id, customer_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND notes LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM projects WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM projects WHERE project_description ILIKE '%important%' AND start_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY completion_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE consultation_purpose = 'Regular Checkup';
SELECT customer_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE project_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT appointment_id, consultation_purpose FROM Appointments WHERE customer_id = 2001 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers JOIN Appointments ON Customers.customer_id = Appointments.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM projects ORDER BY project_deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM workshop_employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, consultation_details FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_deadline > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, customer_id FROM appointments WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id < 50;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, employee_phone FROM workshop_employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT customer_id, consultation_datetime, project_id FROM appointments ORDER BY consultation_datetime DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_notes FROM appointments WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT personnel_name, department FROM workshop_personnel;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT personnel_name, department, position_title FROM workshop_personnel ORDER BY personnel_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_status, consultation_summary FROM appointments_history WHERE appointment_status = 'Completed';
